Title: A starting point for a validation framework using IoC in .NET and C#
Description: The simplest validation framework that applies the Inversion Of Control principle (http://martinfowler.com/articles/injection.html). It's not a real world sample, but a simple starting point to understand a way to implement the separation of tasks in applications.
